typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{représentant} as string,
		{n° département} as string,
		{département} as string,
		{code point de vente} as string,
		{libellé point de vente} as string,
		{code depot source} as string,
		{code client} as string,
		client as string,
		{n° siret} as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		ville as string,
		{année livraison} as string,
		{mois livraison} as string,
		{code fournisseur} as string,
		{fournisseur principal} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		produit as string,
		{réference} as string,
		{qte en unité de vente} as string,
		{montant prv net} as string,
		path as string,
		{numéro fournisseur} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
select5 compose(mapColumn(
		id = idDecrementation,
		PossAMid = POSSAMidString,
		reference = {Réference},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		qte_venteDirecte = {Qté ventes directes}
	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> fdecrementation@(output1)
rename derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
aggregate1 filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente} = {code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source} = {code depot source},
		{Code client} = {code client},
		Client = client,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		Ville = ville,
		{Mois livraison} = {mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit} = {code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net} = {montant prv net},
		{Représentant} = {représentant},
		{N° Département} = {n° département},
		{Département} = {département},
		{Libellé point de vente} = {libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret} = {n° siret},
		{Année livraison} = {année livraison},
		{Réference} = {réference},
		qte_ecoulement = {qte en unité de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(aggregate1@year == RenameVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Réference}, " ", ""))),replace({Réference}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, RenameVentesDirectes join(aggregate1@year == RenameVentesDirectes@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Réference}, " ", ""))),replace({Réference}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article, " ", ""))),replace(Article, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
select2 filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
derivedColumn3, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
fullLeftUnion derive(canal = '',
		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
codePointVenteNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNULL
innerVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		{Montant prv net},
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year = aggregate1@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Article,
		{Code client_right},
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
leftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		{Mois livraison},
		{Montant prv net},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year = aggregate1@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Article,
		{Code client_right},
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		{Montant prv net},
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID,
		Article,
		{Code client_right},
		{Qté ventes directes},
		idDecrementation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
yearAndMonth aggregate(groupBy({Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code postal},
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		fileName,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month),
	qte_ecoulement = sum(qte_ecoulement),
		{Montant prv net} = sum(toDouble({Montant prv net}))) ~> aggregate1
select1 keyGenerate(output(idDecrementation as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> idDecrementation
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Réference},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select4
select4 derive(month = toInteger(month),
		qte_ecoulement = toFloat(qte_ecoulement),
		{Qté ventes directes} = toFloat({Qté ventes directes})) ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Réference},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		{Qté ventes directes}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select5
fdecrementation@output1 select(mapColumn(
		id,
		qt_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
select3, endDecrementation join(idDecrementation == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
join1 derive(qte_ecoulement = qt_final) ~> derivedColumn3
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputQuantityNull
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTECOULPREPARED
posidNULL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['VFCONFORT_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> VFCONFORTORGANISATIONNOTFOUND

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.description:
Inner join on 'dropColumnsInCommon' and 'endArticle'

to get the marque id

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		F5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisaation
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Avoir
source(output(
		{Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{ vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		Prop_0 as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		date_id as string,
		fact_filter as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Facturation
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtarctionSAP
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> REFATC
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Offre
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> articleInput
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputEPS
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PrixPeriode
Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
Facturation, organisaation join(Facturation@HubSAPid == organisaation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerfacturationOrganisation
setHubsID filter(toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> FilterQte
FilterQte derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+"0"+Mois  )) ~> typeCast
aggregate2 derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45,     iif(canal=="FS", 51,     iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		tOrigin = "avoir") ~> mapCanalID
aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Récept. de march.},
		reference = f_Article,
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		HubSAPid,
		tOrigin,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> efacturation
mapCanalID, efacturation join(aggregate2@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid

filter1 filter({origine de la ligne}=="facturation sans ecoulement" || {origine de la ligne}=="facturation avec matching") ~> filter2
filter2 derive({code produit} = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({code produit}, " ", ""))),replace({code produit}, " ", ""))) ~> derivedColumn6
filter3 filter(in(["facturation sans ecoulement","facturation avec matching"],{origine de la ligne})) ~> filter4
filter5 filter(in(["decrementation ecoulement sans matching","ecoulement sans matching","facturation sans ecoulement","facturation avec matching"],{origine de la ligne})) ~> filter6

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as integer,
		{Code Postal fin} as integer,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string,
		{Plan prime} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> atcJoined
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC = {ID SAP},
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes} = {Plan prime},
		Matricule = {ID SAP},
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamle
renamle derive({Canal final} = iif( in(["Vaillant diffus","SD diffus",'Diffus'], {Plan primes}), "Diffus" ,"Chantier" ),
		toreplicate = {Code Postal fin}-{Code Postal début}+1) ~> canalFinal
canalFinal filter({Code Postal début}<= {Code Postal fin}) ~> filtreCodePostal
filtreCodePostal derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index)) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule = ATC,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> dd1
dd1 derive({Code postal} = {Code Postal début}+dd) ~> codePostalUpdate
atcJoined derive({ID SAP} = toInteger({ID SAP})) ~> DerivedColumn1
canalFinal filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter1
renamle filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter3
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial réseau' ], Fonction)) ~> Filter4
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique' ,'Conseiller technique régional'], Fonction)) ~> Filter5
Filter5 select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		IDSAP = ATC,
		Nom = NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> Filter6
Filter6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_atc.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AtcprepareForReplicate
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_CTRCTT.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

properties.description:
o	Pour le cout
	Prendre la facturation « brute » en sortie de SAP/BW
	Filtrer les lignes ou le donneur d’ordre est un CTT
•	Question 2bis (cf plus haut) : il semblerait que nous ayons besoin ID du CTT ?
	Filtrer certaines raisons de commandes et de types de document
•	Question 3 : pouvez-vous nous transmettre le détail des filtres svp ?
	La colonne de cout en sortie sera le « cout standard » présent dans la facturation 
	Ajouter l’information de VMC (en euros) en faisant la jointure en avec le nouveau référentiel VMC (info non dispo dans l’extract à date BW)
	Ajouter les méta données produits, client, CTT, comme dans la base commerciale

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputFacturation
inputFacturation select(mapColumn(
		{Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MarketingCout.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		{ID SAP} as string,
		{Lancement Maj Affectation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refaffectation
Select2 derive(Utilisateur = Utilisateur) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		{ID SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation
filteredcolumnsrefrefaffectation derive({Plan prime} = iif( Fonction== "Attaché commercial réseau" || Fonction == "Attaché commercial réseau 2" , "Diffus", iif( Fonction == "Attaché commercial prescription"  , "Chantier", ""  )  )) ~> DerivedColumn3
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR,
		{ID SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
refaffectation filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial réseau' ,'Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique' ,'Conseiller technique régional'], Fonction)) ~> Filter2
Filter2 filter({ID SAP}=="16400015") ~> Filter3
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['atc_affectation_lower.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> atcAffectationLower
